00058 class OSIMCOMMON_API VisibleProperties: public Object
00059 {
00060 public:
00061     enum  DisplayPreference {
00062             None=0,
00063             WireFrame=1,
00064             SolidFill=2,
00065             FlatShaded=3,
00066             GouraudShaded=4,
00067             PhongShaded=5,
00068             BoundingBox=6
00069     };
